title: (x) Hustle & Flow movie logo - Simian {Hanno Bennert}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120230829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hustle_and_flow_ver2_6322.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120230829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hustle_and_Flow_2_6020.jpg)

this is probably an easy one for you guys, but if anybody knows what font was used for the hustle and flow logo it would be greatly appreciated. thanks a lot!

-danny

 [‹ (x) "Morton Feldman Says" book cover and inside pages - Helvetica, Times New Roman {Mike Diaz, Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120230829/http:/typophile.com/node/21205 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Where have all the crazies gone?" stencil face - Cargo {Mark Foster} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120230829/http:/typophile.com/node/21228 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
i think it’s simian display gorilla from house industries…  
i don’t know about the ampersand…
thanks a million, i think you’re right!
